description: The waiter (Garcon) of the Bishoku-kai and Kuromado`s personal aide. He has a very large nose and eight arms, giving him the appearance of a spider. He also has been seen to resist the intense cold of Ice Hell while wearing just a tuxedo and cape. His attacks are all based on the plates he keeps hidden in his tuxedo. He is one of the few Bishoku-kai members capable of entering the Gourmet World.
name: Alfaro
